description:
Single parametric EQ band with configurable filter type, gain, frequency, and Q.

# Internal Type This is the internal representation. API consumers should use the JSON-RPC methods to interact with EQ bands via paths like `/audio/output/speaker/1/user/eq/bands/3`.

# Filter Types Supports 9 filter types: Parametric, LowPass6/12, HighPass6/12, LowShelf, HighShelf, AllPass, BandPass

# Structure - `kind`: Filter type (parametric, shelf, pass, etc.) - `gain`: Filter gain in dB (-20.0 to +20.0) - `frequency`: Center/corner frequency in Hz (20.0 to 20000.0) - `q`: Filter Q factor (0.1 to 20.0) - bandwidth control - `bypass`: Individual band bypass

# Patch Type `EqualizerBandPatch` is auto-generated via `#[derive(Patch)]` for partial updates. Used in API responses to indicate which fields changed.

frequency.description: Center or corner frequency in Hz (range: 20.0 to 20000.0)

kind.description: Filter type: Parametric, LowPass6/12, HighPass6/12, LowShelf, HighShelf, AllPass, BandPass

q.description: Filter Q factor (bandwidth control, range: 0.1 to 20.0). Lower Q = wider bandwidth.

title: EqualizerBand
